title: Looking for Ziggs mains! S5-S1
body:
Im looking to stack up a category of Ziggs mains on my friends list. I want someone who heavy mains him and wants to play Ziggs every game. I have a great strategy with my friend that we constantly do, and a Ziggs will only expand on that power heavily.

I've mained Ziggs before and I have a certain strategy I will show you that is different then normal Ziggs, and I've used him in ranked up to P4 before going 20 win 5 losses with that strategy. It would be perfect for what me and my bud are doing.

replies.body: Can't say I'm a main but I love playing the champ.  Show me the bones, Jones.

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=kzpLwTjp,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-09-15T21:48:44.801+0000)
>
> Can't say I'm a main but I love playing the champ.  Show me the bones, Jones.

Ill get you into it, added

> [{quoted}](name=SteveJones92,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=kzpLwTjp,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-09-15T22:00:11.653+0000)
>
> Ill get you into it, added

Cool, thanks
so you use ap items and attack from range.  Very nice strategy.
